coreAttributes.authorTag: On the handle of the Coomhammer, there is a small inscription that reads "Cajun Creations by Tasty's Priest Sauce LLC."
coreAttributes.name: Coomhammer
coreAttributes.description: The Coomhammer is called the Coomhammer because when its owner takes it into battle, it spells coom for the enemy.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(heft)] the Coomhammer, readying it for use in combat.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(relax)] the Coomhammer, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: Swinging out with [npc.her] Coomhammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slam [npc2.name] in the chest; the mighty hammer plowing into [npc2.her] torso to drain [npc2.her] energy!
Swinging out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Coomhammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(manage)] to slam [npc2.her] [npc2.arm] mighty hammer and drain [npc2.her] energy!
Lunging forward, [npc.name] [npc.verb(swing)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Coomhammer, slamming the mighty hammer into [npc2.her] shoulder and causing [npc2.herHim] to lose some energy!
hitDescriptions.criticalHitText: Expertly swinging around [npc2.namePos] attempt to block [npc.her] attack, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slam)] a devastating hit with [npc.her] Coomhammer!

Swinging at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Coomhammer, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a disgusted groan as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
